de.jannlab.generator

Class RNNGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jannlab.generator.RNNGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetGenerator

    public class RNNGenerator
extends Object
implements NetGenerator
    This class provides macro methods to easy setup RNNs. The class uses the NetCoreGenerator internal.

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte
    See Also:
    NetCoreGenerator

        type - Instance of CellType.
        usebias - True if bias sould be used.

        public static int hiddenLayer(NetCoreGenerator gen,
              int num,
              CellType type,

        num - Number of input neurons.
        type - Instance of CellType.

        Layer index.
